dialogueLines.line: You again! What are you doing here!
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: So uh...can you give us a ride to our destination?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: There's a venue holding a rap tournament and we want to go.
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: And why should I take you there?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Because...it would be kind of you to...?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Get off of my limo right now.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: What if we make it worth your while?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: How about a singing bout along the way?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf
